short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Victory sound and Fatality sound at the end of games along text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Message Pops up saying Victory and Fatality after every game on lichess.  Note, you must be logged into lichess for this extension to work.
